title: S4 Ep22: State v. Greg Lance – Addendum 11 – Tweaking & Geeking
itunes:title: State v. Greg Lance – Addendum 11 – Tweaking & Geeking
description:
November 21, 2019 / Susan, Rabia, and Linda Bowsman join Rebecca to discuss the Horns, the prime suspects in the Kolesnikow murders.
 
Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.
 
Today’s addendum has been sponsored by Uncommon Goods, The Bouqs, and Perfect Snacks.
